ComicInfo.Title: Charlie Brown's Star; Dogstoevsky; Good Golly miss Mall-ie; Classic Peanuts Strips
ComicInfo.Summary:
When stars fill the skies, Charlie Brown, Lucy, and Linus must seek out the one star that can be called Charlie Brown’s own. Charlie Brown’s Star and many more brand-new adventures like "Dogstoyefsky" and "Sally’s Great Pumpkin" can be found in this exciting issue of Peanuts.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz | 1 | RE | First Appearance BOOM! Studios Exclusive Cover | Charles M. Schulz | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:43:58. [CVDB468124]
ComicInfo.Writer: Art Roche, Charles M. Schulz, Jeff Dyer
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles M. Schulz, Scott Jeralds, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Alexis E. Fajardo, Charles M. Schulz, Justin Thompson, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Colorist: Bill Bedard, Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Katharine Efird, Lisa Moore, Nina Taylor Kester, Nomi Kane
ComicInfo.Letterer: Donna Almendrala, Nomi Kane, Steve Wands
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Rebecca Taylor, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Snoopy, Woodstock
